titlestmt.titleproper: Ente Turistico Alberghiero della Libia. Tourism Poster Contest Exhibit photograph
Guide to the Ente Turistico Alberghiero della Libia. Tourism Poster Contest Exhibit photograph, 1936 RL.11579
titlestmt.author: Richard Collier

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-01-24 14:00:47 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Ente Turistico Alberghiero della Libia. Tourism Poster Contest Exhibit photograph

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History

did.abstract: Italian agency created in 1934 to promote tourism to Libya. Black and white photograph of entrants in a tourism poster design contest. Exhibit was held in the Concourse of the Grand Hotel in Tripoli. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Italian agency created in 1934 to promote tourism to Libya.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Ente Turistico Alberghiero della Libia. Tourism Poster Contest Exhibit photograph was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 2017.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Ente Turistico Alberghiero della Libia. Tourism Poster Contest Exhibit photograph, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2017-0032

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found in the following Hartman Center collections:
Anspach Travel Bureau Collection of Tourism Literature;
Foote, Cone & Belding Communications, Inc. records;
Roy Lightner Collection of Antique Advertisements

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Black and white photograph of entrants in a tourism poster design contest. Exhibit was held in the Concourse of the Grand Hotel in Tripoli. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
